sentences.english: He handled the gaggle of media, sponsors and fans with extraordinary aplomb .
sentences.chinese: 他處理的媒體，贊助商和球迷們以非凡的沉着鵝羣。

sentences.english: But, I'm a diehard Post-Its fan.
sentences.chinese: 但是，我是一個頑固後它的球迷。

sentences.english: The Sakhnin fans will say it was a plastic bullet.
sentences.chinese: 薩克寧哈普洱隊的球迷會說這是一個橡皮子彈所爲。

sentences.english: Oh, he's a White Sox fan?
sentences.chinese: 哦，他是白襪子隊的球迷？

sentences.english: Basketball fans miss Magic Johnson 's razzle dazzle in the game.
sentences.chinese: 籃球迷們懷念魔術師強納生球賽中的花招。

sentences.english: I am your fan. I have collected lots of information about you.
sentences.chinese: 我是你的球迷，我收集了你的很多信息。

sentences.english: How are Lakers fans supposed to interpret these comments?
sentences.chinese: 湖人球迷應當這麼解讀加索爾的表態呢？

sentences.english: He also insisted United would not fleece fans despite the demand for season tickets.
sentences.chinese: 他還強調雖然季票很搶手，但是球隊不會壓榨球迷。

sentences.english: It will be a possession game virtually every game, probably to a fan's delight.
sentences.chinese: 幾乎每場都會是寸土必爭的比賽，也許正對球迷口味。

sentences.english: The expectations of 'De Bestest Fans in de Werld Ever, Like' have become unreasonably high.
sentences.chinese: “最忠誠的球迷”對他們的期待高得不合情理。

sentences.english: The football fans lined up for the tickets.
I just hope I didn't hurt anyone to the right side of the goal with my second shot!
sentences.chinese: 我希望沒有第二個打飛的點球沒有傷到球迷。

sentences.english: I am not worried because I will talk to the supporters.
sentences.chinese: 我並不擔心，因爲我會同尤文球迷進行對話的。

sentences.english: I am personally delighted with today's announcement as I'm a Toffees fan.
sentences.chinese: 我本人非常高興今天宣佈作爲我太妃糖的球迷。

sentences.english: The football fan often fans his fan .
sentences.chinese: 那個足球迷經常扇扇子。

sentences.english: My father is a crazy basketball fan, so I am under his influence.
sentences.chinese: 我的爸爸是狂熱的籃球迷，所以我受了他的影響。

definition: hissing sound/to hiss (as a sign of displeasure)
to watch a football game (or other ball game)/Fore! (golf)/Watch out for the ball!
bean vermicelli/mung bean starch noodles/Chinese vermicelli/cellophane noodles/CL:把[ba3]/fan (loanword)/enthusiast for sb or sth
